definition: to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: He unscrewed a jar of mustard.
sentences.chinese: 他擰開了芥子醬的瓶蓋。

sentences.english: The papers twisted everything I said.
sentences.chinese: 這個帽兒應該容易擰開。

sentences.english: He strides over to the kitchen sink and flips on the faucet.
sentences.chinese: 他大步走向廚房的水槽並擰開龍頭。

sentences.english: And Lincoln also unscrewed the pipe and unlocked himself.
sentences.chinese: 而林肯也擰開了管子並且掙脫了。

sentences.english: It requires no more preparation than turning on a tap.
sentences.chinese: 它不用置備，只要擰開水龍頭就好了。

sentences.english: I twisted off the lid and looked inside.
The student twisted the cap off a fountain pen.
sentences.chinese: 那個學生把自來水筆筆套擰開了。

sentences.english: Although we are knocked wing, but took the opportunity to screw McCarran opened the aircraft fuel tank.
sentences.chinese: 雖然被打落機翼，麥卡倫卻乘機擰開了飛機油箱。

sentences.english: The cap should twist off easily.
sentences.chinese: 這個帽兒應該容易擰開。

sentences.english: It's kind of like when someone opens a pickle jar and you say, "Well, I loosened it."
sentences.chinese: 就好比有人擰開了一個罐頭，你說，是我把它擰鬆的。

sentences.english: This is the cap of my fountain pen.
sentences.chinese: 那個學生把自來水筆筆套擰開了。

sentences.english: The boy twisted the top off the bottle.
Video images showed robotic arms working to unscrew its bolts.
sentences.chinese: 電視圖像顯示了機器人擰開法蘭螺栓的工作鏡頭。

sentences.english: He used all of his efforts to loosen the screw.
sentences.chinese: 他用盡全力來擰開這個螺旋裝置。

sentences.english: The shampoo bottle head had been unscrewed completely and spilled on the floor, seeping into the mat.
sentences.chinese: 洗髮水的瓶蓋擰開了，都流到了地上，滲進地毯裏。

sentences.english: stomp up the stairs, swing the bedroom door open, and jump up on the bed.
sentences.chinese: 然後踢開前門，重重的踩着樓梯擰開臥室門，跳上牀。
